title: @Roit Clan tag still broken
body:
I am currently unable to see my Clan tag. 

Clan: Demons of the Kingdom
Clan tag: DotK

Thank you in advance for fixing it

replies.body:
We can't fix it here on the boards, but if you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), one of our specialists will be happy to assist you further with troubleshooting your club issue.

Let me know if you have any questions.
